head_message.heading1: Find Your Perfect Fit: Start Small or
head_message.heading2: Go Big with Our SEO Partnership
head_message.text_line: One-size-fits-all is for baseball caps and parachute pants, that ain't us. Discover various affordable SEO services that match your pace and financial plan.

first_card.heading: Ongoing SEO Management
first_card.pera: We handle your SEO tasks, allowing you to focus on growing your business.

others_card.heading: One-Time SEO Audit
others_card.pera: We analyze and provide a list of strategies to boost your organic ranking.

others_card.heading: One-Time SEO Setup
others_card.pera: We'll fix and clean things up and ensure your future SEO direction is solid.

others_card.heading: Ongoing SEO Consulting
others_card.pera: We'll meet regularly to ensure your in-house team continues to progress.

others_card.heading: Pure SEO Performance
others_card.pera: Revenue split SEO partnership. Less risk for you, higher reward for us.
